mapper.insert:
insert into GROUP_BUY_ACTIVITY
COURSE_ID,
END_TIME,
STATUS,
CREATE_TIME,
GROUP_BUY_PRICE,
HOT,
TITLE,
#{courseId,jdbcType = INTEGER},
#{endTime,typeHandler = com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
#{status,jdbcType = INTEGER},
#{createTime,typeHandler = com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
#{groupBuyPrice,jdbcType = DOUBLE},
#{hot,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
update GROUP_BUY_ACTIVITY
COURSE_ID = #{courseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
END_TIME = #{endTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,typeHandler=com.ishangke.edunav.dataaccess.typeHandler.CalendarTypeHandler},
GROUP_BUY_PRICE = #{groupBuyPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
HOT = #{hot,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
,
,
,
,
,
,
,
,
,
,
,
from GROUP_BUY_ACTIVITY left join COURSE_TEMPLATE on COURSE_TEMPLATE.ID = GROUP_BUY_ACTIVITY.COURSE_ID left join (select course_template_id as course_template_id,avg(CONDITION_RATING) as avgcondition,avg(ATTITUDE_RATING) as avgattitude,avg(SATISFACTION_RATING) as avgsatisfaction from course_comment group by course_template_id) as temp on temp.course_template_id = GROUP_BUY_ACTIVITY.COURSE_ID left join COURSE_TEMPLATE_TEACHER COURSE_TEMPLATE_TEACHER ON COURSE_TEMPLATE_TEACHER.COURSE_TEMPLATE_ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE.ID left join TEACHER TEACHER ON TEACHER.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE_TEACHER.TEACHER_ID left join CLASS_PHOTO CLASS_PHOTO ON COURSE_TEMPLATE.PARTNER_ID = CLASS_PHOTO.PARTNER_ID and CLASS_PHOTO.DELETED = 0 left join PARTNER PARTNER ON PARTNER.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE.PARTNER_ID left join CATEGORY CATEGORY ON CATEGORY.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE.CATEGORY_ID left join CIRCLE CIRCLE ON CIRCLE.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE.CIRCLE_ID left join LOCATION LOCATION ON LOCATION.ID = COURSE_TEMPLATE.LOCATION_ID left join GROUP_BUY_PHOTO on GROUP_BUY_PHOTO.GROUP_BUY_ACTIVITY_ID = GROUP_BUY_ACTIVITY.ID and GROUP_BUY_PHOTO.DELETED = 0 left join GROUP_BUY_ADDRESS on GROUP_BUY_ACTIVITY.ID = GROUP_BUY_ADDRESS.GROUP_BUY_ACTIVITY_ID and GROUP_BUY_ADDRESS.DELETED = 0 left join ADDRESS on GROUP_BUY_ADDRESS.ADDRESS_ID = ADDRESS.ID and ADDRESS.DELETED = 0 where GROUP_BUY_ACTIVITY.DELETED = 0 and GROUP_BUY_ACTIVITY.ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
